QueryNode.Name: Surveillance DNS
QueryNode.Description: Vue personalisée pour suvieller les évenements critiques du service DNS

Query.Select: *[System[(Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3 or Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=2 or EventID=4 or EventID=409 or (EventID >= 501 and EventID <= 502) or (EventID >= 6001 and EventID <= 6002) )]]
*[System[(Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3 or Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=2 or EventID=4 or EventID=409 or (EventID >= 501 and EventID <= 502) or (EventID >= 6001 and EventID <= 6002) )]]
*[System[(Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3 or Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=2 or EventID=4 or EventID=409 or (EventID >= 501 and EventID <= 502) or (EventID >= 6001 and EventID <= 6002) )]]
*[System[(Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3 or Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=2 or EventID=4 or EventID=409 or (EventID >= 501 and EventID <= 502) or (EventID >= 6001 and EventID <= 6002) )]]
*[System[(Level=1 or Level=2 or Level=3 or Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=2 or EventID=4 or EventID=409 or (EventID >= 501 and EventID <= 502) or (EventID >= 6001 and EventID <= 6002) )]]
